img_summary: This image depicts **Millennium Ginseng**, a rare ingredient featured in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is associated with the preceding and following context, which lists various in-game ingredients and their locations or acquisition methods. Millennium Ginseng is described as being randomly obtained from collecting Aged Ginseng, emphasizing its rarity and value within the game's narrative and mechanics. The image visually represents the ingredient, aiding players in identifying it during gameplay.
